import React from 'react' import { Pre, LineNo } from './styles' import Highlight, { defaultProps } from 'prism-react-renderer' import theme from 'prism-react-renderer/themes/nightOwl' import './style.css' const exampleCode = ` (function someDemo() { var test = "Hello World!"; console.log(test); })(); return () => ; `.trim() export default function Snippets(props) { let snippet_array = [] let comment_array = [] props.snippets.comments.forEach(comm =>{ comment_array.push(
  • {comm.auth_firstname} {comm.auth_lastname} {comm.createdAt}

    {comm.body}

    • ) }) props.snippets.forEach(snippet=>{ snippet_array.push(
    {snippet.author.first_name} {snippet.author.last_name} {snippet.createdAt}

    {snippet.title}

    {snippet.desc}

    {({ className, style, tokens, getLineProps, getTokenProps }) => ( 
                                    {tokens.map((line, i) => (
                                    
    
                                        {i + 1}
                                        {line.map((token, key) => )}
                                    
    
                                ))}
    )}     written with : {snippet.lang} This snippet helped {snippet.likes} people
    Comments


      {comment_array}
    ) }) return (
    {snip}
    ) }
